about.details:
Incorporated in 1994, Ahmedabad based Veeram Infra Engineering Limited is a company engaged in the business of printing, trading of general mercantile and real estate.

In the last 2-3 years, the company has made changes in its MoA wherein 70% company`s revenues from now on shall be earned through its real estate business and the remaining from the ancillary business.

The company has entered into a land development agreement measuring approximately 7.34 hectares at Sanand, Ahmedabad. The company will do the levelling and landfilling sell these plots in different sizes.

The company has 13 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Veeram Infra Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer:
Veeram Infra Engineering IPO is a SME IPO of 2106000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.74 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2018, and closes on October 12, 2018.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Veeram Infra Engineering IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Veeram Infra Engineering IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Veeram Infra Engineering IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Veeram Infra Engineering IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Veeram Infra Engineering IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Veeram Infra Engineering IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Veeram Infra Engineering IPO opens on September 28, 2018 and closes on October 12, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Veeram Infra Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: Veeram Infra Engineering IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Veeram Infra Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Veeram Infra Engineering IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
